title: Chat GPT Trivia Game

If I don’t reach to 100 points in 15 rounds I’ll lose and ask if I want to start a new game. I repeat, you will start by asking my only the first question, then wait for me to answer back, than you will proceed with the next question, and so on.       Let’s start.
